example.eg: The river washed the branch downstream.
example.egtrans: 河流将树枝冲往下游方向。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 顺流而下, 朝下游方向

dsense.name: downstream
dsense.guideword: (further down a stream or river) (河流)

example.eg: The downstream area of the river is really pretty.
example.egtrans: 这条河下游地区非常美。

example.eg: The company is trying to secure downstream funding.
example.egtrans: 该公司正在试图搞到后期的资金。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 后期的, 后程的, 后半阶段的

dsense.name: downstream
dsense.guideword: figurative (oil industry: of, for derived products) (炼油业)

dsense.name: downstream
dsense.guideword: figurative (oil industry: of, for derived products) (炼油业)

dsense.name: downstream
dsense.guideword: figurative (computing: sent to a computer, network) (计算机)
